Kraft A-B Gullspång-Munkfors, las :dir. i Lidköp., ordf. där sed. 43, stadsfullm. ised. 19, v. ordf. sed. 39, landstingsman sed. 32, ordf. i styr. f. Sparbanken i Lidköp. Led. av Spa|rbankernas Bank A-B,s styr. i Sthlm sed. 46, oTdf. i fören. f. Pauvres Ho’n-teux i Lidköp. ’sed. 44, i fören. Lidköp. Frimurarebröder sed. 32. ’RVO, Sv. köpmiförb. ftjGM.
translated: Bergwik, Ernst Wilhelm, director, Lidköping, born July 29, 1880 in Skara to foster father Johan Jonsson and Klara Wollstedt. Married in 1906 to Elin Boije. Children: Gunvor born in 1908, Gösta born in 1910, civil engineer, Malmö. Own business since 1904, transformed into A-B Bergwiks Herrekiper in 1936. Chairman of the Swedish Clothing and Fashion Merchants' Association from 1938-1943, Vice Chairman of the Swedish Merchants' Association until 1943, Honorary Member of the Västergötl. Merchants' Association, Honorary Chairman of the Lidköping Merchants' Association, member of the board of directors of Kraft A-B Gullspång-Munkfors, district director in Lidköping, chairman since 1943, city council member since 1919, vice chairman since 1939, county council member since 1932, chairman of the board of directors of the Savings Bank in Lidköping. Member of the board of directors of Spa|rbanken's Bank A-B in Stockholm since 1946, chairman of the association for Pauvres Honteux in Lidköping since 1944, member of the Lidköping Freemasons' Association since 1932. RVO, Swedish Merchants' Association ftjGM.
